item.title: Kae Sun - Ship And The Globe
item.description:
Oceans
apart
And it’s heavy
on my heart
Roll
and row
But my rolling game
too slow
I’m happy
you know
I’m spending
my time
Watching the ship
and the globe
Why beauty’s
in the simple things
Your sweetness
and your elegance
I’m happy
you know
Pa pa pa pa pa pa
pa pa pa pa pa pa
Pa pa pa pa pa pa
pa pa pa pa pa pa
Oceans
apart
And I’m sailing
on my dreams
Roll
and row
But my rolling game
too wild
I’m lost
in your smile
I’m spending
my time
Watching the ship
and the globe
Why beauty’s
in the simple things
Your sweetness
and your elegance
I’m happy
you know
Pa pa pa pa pa pa
pa pa pa pa pa pa
Pa pa pa pa pa pa
pa pa pa pa pa pa

pa pa pa pa pa pa

pa pa pa pa pa pa
